definition: "eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
girl/servant girl/(used deprecatingly, but sometimes also as a term of endearment)
variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
fork (of a tree)/tool made of forked wood
traditional hairstyle for children, with two pointy braids, giving it a horn-like appearance
see 腳丫子|脚丫子[jiao3 ya1 zi5]
fork (of a tree, road, argument etc)/bifurcation/fork junction
(dialect) to rush off/to scamper off double-quick/to take to one's heels/to make oneself scarce

sentences.english: Hillary was a good choice, she can tell a lie without even blinking.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里是一个不错的选择，丫简直说谎不带眨眼的。

sentences.english: You know what he did that night?
sentences.chinese: 你们知道丫那天晚上干嘛了吗？

sentences.english: He's more concerned about spilled cereal than having a brain-damaged child.
sentences.chinese: 看来比起有个脑瘫的孩子来说，丫更在意丫的麦片。

sentences.english: Didn't you learn anything from the great recession?
sentences.chinese: 难道你丫还没有从大衰退中学到点什么吗？

sentences.english: Where in the hell did he get that shirt?
sentences.chinese: 他丫的到底是从哪儿搞到的那件衬衫？

sentences.english: I tell you no understand, I wanna fork on the table.
sentences.chinese: 我说你丫不明白，我要在桌子上干。

sentences.english: Man, what da fuck is wrong wit you?
sentences.chinese: 伙计，你丫到底有什么毛病？

sentences.english: He say you better not 'sheet' on the bed, you son of a 'beach'.
sentences.chinese: 她说，你丫的最好不要在桌子上干，你是海滩之子。

sentences.english: Save your commiserations and judges, look at the truth.
sentences.chinese: 收起你们丫的同情和评价吧，看清事情的真相。

sentences.english: In the second question, I answered to Hainan, San Ya.
sentences.chinese: 在第二个问题中，我回答了去海南的三丫。

sentences.english: Your ya is on dogs and pigs hybrid product or doesn't make a crab walk straight.
sentences.chinese: 你丫的就是狗和猪的杂交产品还是改不了吃屎。

definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
to draw back the corners of one's mouth
see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
see 王八羔子[wang2 ba1 gao1 zi5]
